definition: to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

pinyin: Ke1 luo2 la1 duo1 da4 xia2 gu3

sentences.english: Two girlfriends and I piled into a car and headed to Aspen, Colo.
sentences.chinese: 我和两个女友挤进一辆车，驰向科罗拉多的阿斯彭。

sentences.english: Rows of winter wheat wind their way to the Colorado horizon.
sentences.chinese: 美国科罗拉多州，成行成排的冬小麦绵亘不绝。

sentences.english: Mahone calls his ex-wife Pam in Colorado.
sentences.chinese: 马宏与他在科罗拉多州的前妻通了电话。

sentences.english: Colorado Children's Chorale is one of the three best children's chorales.
sentences.chinese: 科罗拉多童声合唱团是世界最著名的三大合唱团之一。

sentences.english: Only Colorado and Washington, D.C., had obesity rates under 20 percent.
sentences.chinese: 只有科罗拉多州和华盛顿州的肥胖率在20%以下。

sentences.english: Moto is deadvert. This is the era of Apple.
sentences.chinese: 摩托罗拉曾经死了，这是苹果的时代。

sentences.english: Porcelain, theme song of the ad "MOTO" cell phone in 1998.
sentences.chinese: “陶瓷”，1998年摩托罗拉手机广告歌。

sentences.english: MOTOROLA the 2005 global sales totaled $368 billion.
sentences.chinese: 摩托罗拉2005年的全球销售总额为368亿美元。

sentences.english: Top roller covers are only one small link in the complex chain of yarn manufacture.
sentences.chinese: 上罗拉皮圈是复杂的纱线生产流程中一个很小的环节。

sentences.english: Aurora introduced one of the first cell-phone-guided walking tours offered in America.
sentences.chinese: 奥罗拉是美国率先引进电池电话导航旅游的地方。

sentences.english: Lola said a wide variety of women sought the services of male prostitutes.
sentences.chinese: 罗拉说有各种各样的女性在寻求男妓服务。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the solution to the problem of combing drawing-off roller licked by linen.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了对亚麻精梳机引出罗拉缠麻问题的攻关改造。
奥罗拉当然还是睡着了。

sentences.english: Innovation is a recognized part of Motorola's 75-year heritage.
sentences.chinese: 年来，摩托罗拉一直秉承着创新的传统。

sentences.english: Or will MMV just cease to exist.
sentences.chinese: 抑或摩托罗拉移动风险投资将不复存在？

sentences.english: Worn clothing and feed roller bearings.
sentences.chinese: 针布破损和给棉罗拉轴承坏。

definition: see 莎草[suo1 cao3]/see 摩莎[mo2 suo1]
Clark T. Randt Jr. (1945-), US ambassador to Beijing 2001-2009
